current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and
		  Emergency Assistance Act to provide assistance for condominiums and housing
		  cooperatives damaged by a major disaster, and for other
		  purposes.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Homeland Security and
			 Governmental Affairs

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by
			 adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 102 of the Robert T. Stafford
			 Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:102

quote.#tail:
means a
				multi-unit housing project in which each dwelling unit is separately owned, and
				the remaining portions of the real estate are designated for common ownership
				solely by the owners of those units, each owner having an undivided interest in
				the common elements, and which is represented by a condominium association
				consisting exclusively of all the unit owners in the project, which is, or will
				be responsible for the operation, administration, and management of the
				project.

means a multi-unit housing project in which
				each dwelling unit is subject to separate use and possession by one or more
				cooperative members whose interest in such unit, and in any undivided assets of
				the cooperative association that are appurtenant to such unit, is evidenced by
				a membership or share interest in a cooperative association and a lease or
				other document of title or possession granted by such cooperative as the owner
				of all cooperative property.

header.#text:
Condominiums and
			 housing cooperatives damaged by a major disaster

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section
			 408(b)(1) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance
			 Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:b/p:1

text.#text:
by adding at the
			 end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:c/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: with respect to residential elements that are the legal responsibility of an association for a condominium or housing cooperative, the terms
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:c/p:3

quote.#tail: include the association for the condominium or housing cooperative.

text.#text: For purposes of providing financial assistance under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 408(h)
			 of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:h

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the maximum amount of assistance that an association for a condominium or housing cooperative may receive under this section with respect to a single disaster shall be an amount to be determined by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:h/p:1

text.#text: In lieu of the limit established under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be adjusted annually in accordance with
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:h/p:3/sp:A
Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act/s:408/ss:h/p:2

header.#text:
Special rule for
				condominiums and housing cooperatives

text.#text:
The
			 amendments made by this section shall apply to a major disaster or emergency
			 declared by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
after the date of enactment
			 of this Act.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and
			 Emergency Assistance Act
